typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ClassID as string,
		Start as timestamp 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss',
		Finish as timestamp 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss',
		Teacher as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> classdata
source(output(
		ClassID as string,
		StudentID as string,
		HorseName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> classhorsestudentdata
classdata, classhorsestudentdata join(classdata@ClassID == classhorsestudentdata@ClassID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinClassHorseStudent
